dcterms:description: The agent tries to swing up and stabilize a pendulum by applying torque on the hinge given a biased distribution over mass and length. Initial state is randomized after every 10s episode.
dcterms:title: PENDULUMSWINGUP

dcterms:creator: Xue Bin Peng
Marcin Andrychowicz
Wojciech Zaremba
Pieter Abbeel
dcterms:description: A sparse version of the task from the Deepmind Control Suite where the goal is to swing and catch a ball in a cup. The agent is provided with a biased distribution over the ballâ€™s mass, moment of inertia, and tendon stiffness.
dcterms:title: BALLINCUPSPARSE

dcterms:creator: Matthias Plappert
Marcin Andrychowicz

dcterms:description: The agent controls the cartesian position and opening of a Fetch robot gripper to push a block to a goal location. A biased distribution over the mass, moment of inertia, friction coefficients, and size of the object is provided.
dcterms:title: FETCHPUSHBLOCK

dcterms:creator: Yevgen Chebotar
Ankur Handa
Viktor Makoviychuk
Miles Macklin
Jan Issac
Nathan Ratliff
Dieter Fox
dcterms:description: Based on a real-world manipulation problem where the agent controls a 7DOF Franka Panda arm to open a cabinet drawer. A biased distribution over damping and friction loss of robot and drawer joints is provided.
dcterms:title: FRANKADRAWEROPEN
